CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 20, 1965, pg. 4 reads: "In Happier Days - Mrs. Mattie McLain Thompson took steps to shed her latest husband of a few months, Ashton Ross this week. She filed suit for divorce in Allegheny County, Monday, against Ross who originally came to Pittsburgh from Trinidad, British West Indies.  They were married in "Little" Washington, Pa. Ross returned to Trinidad shortly after their marriage and has not returned.  Mrs. Ross, who lives in Beltzhoover and is well known in religious circles could not be reached for comment at press time. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Ashton Ross, and Mattie Thompson McClain wearing light colored sleeveless dress, psoed in domestic interior
